titleInfo.title: The effect of temperature on the kinetics of a reverse micellar protein extraction process

mods.abstract: The kinetics of transfer of chymotrypsin from an aqueous into a reverse micellar phase and vice versa has been examined for a two-phase system with planar interface equipped with vibrating disks for separate mixing of both phases. The temperature dependence of the mass-transfer coefficients gives two values for the forward transfer (30 and 90 kJ/mol) depending on the temperature range. Only one value is obtained for the backward transfer (60 kJ/mol).
